home.UTILIZAMOS_MATERIAL_ALTA_CALIDAD: High-quality materials such as corrugated cardboard or kraft paper, ideal for protecting and preserving freshness throughout the journey.

about_us.FRUTA_FRESCA_PRINCIPIO_FIN: Fresh fruit from harvest to customer.
about_us.FRESH_FOOD_GARANTIZAMOS: At Fresh Food, we guarantee a controlled supply chain from origin to final delivery.
about_us.SIN_INTERMEDIARIOS: No intermediaries between the fruit and our transportation.
about_us.LA_UNICA_MANERA_DE_GARANTIZAR: The only way to guarantee and certify our product under strict standards of quality, freshness, and nutritional value.
about_us.SEGUIMOS_PROTOCOLOS_RIGUROSOS: We follow rigorous protocols that ensure product integrity throughout the entire logistics process.
about_us.SABEMOS_QUE_ELEGIR_ALIMENTOS: We know that choosing imported food means trusting the process. That’s why we work every day to optimize our supply systems and ensure you receive the best.

pack.CONTROL_TEMPERATURA: Temperature control during transit and storage
pack.CUMPLIMIENTO_NORMATIVAS: Compliance with international sanitary and phytosanitary regulations
pack.MANTENEMOS_CADENA: We maintain the cold chain from origin to destination to preserve fruit freshness.
pack.UTILIZAMOS_EMPAQUES: We use packaging designed to protect tropical fruits during international transport.
pack.OFRECEMOS_MONITOREO: We offer real-time monitoring of each shipment, from the farm to the final customer.
pack.CUMPLIMOS_ESTANDARES: We comply with global standards that guarantee quality, safety, and access to demanding markets.

contact.DEJANOS_TUS_DATOS: Déjanos tus datos y te llamamos

logistic.SABEMOS_QUE_PARA_CONFIAR: We know that in order to trust the quality of our tropical fruits, you need to understand how we handle them throughout the entire transportation process.
logistic.QUEREMOS_EXPLICARTE: We want to clearly explain what happens from the moment the fruit is harvested by the picker to the moment it reaches your hands.
